title.de: Herr, wie du willt, so schicks mit mir

instrumentation: soprano, tenor, bass, choir (SATB), horn, 2 oboes, 2 violins, viola, basso continuo
notes: Composed for the third Sunday after Epiphany. Revised version performed in 1748 or 1749 with organ replacing horn.

movements.title: Herr, wie du willt, so schicks mit mir
Ach senke doch den Geist der Freuden
